Question.Subject: Which internet provider(s) have the best reviews?
Question.Content: I was thinking Earthlink but I recently saw some negative things about it. I'm taking online college for the first 2 years so I need a service with high speed and decent protection. Windstream's not all that good ( they charge lots more for less), and Cable One did the same thing. Please help
Question.ChosenAnswer: Verizon is arguably the best internet provider, assuming they have fiber optic cables run in your area. Other than that, there's a company called Access4less in my are that provides only internet service (no e-mail or antivirus) for $10 a month and it's great for it's price.

Answer.Content: Verizon is arguably the best internet provider, assuming they have fiber optic cables run in your area. Other than that, there's a company called Access4less in my are that provides only internet service (no e-mail or antivirus) for $10 a month and it's great for it's price.
